查找排行榜上的牛人,按总损益排名，或按特定的“英雄指数”排名。你也可以按交易所、行业、月收益、季度收益、总收益进行筛选。\n\n竞技好友排行榜，与微博、QQ好友较劲

Search for stocks across all our supported exchanges by typing into the search bar on the top of the screen. You can search by company or symbol name.\n\nIf you prefer, you can scroll through the trending stocks: these are the stocks that other TradeHero users are buying and selling.

Trade Price* is set to the market ask price when buying, and the bid price when selling. This is to simulate Market Order type transactions. For some stocks, we don't have ask and bid data. For these stocks, we use the last traded price of the stock.

Trade Quantity is limited to 20% of Average Daily Volume or Current Day Volume, whichever is higher. Your Trade Value may be limited due to this constraint.

*Price is delayed as specified by financial exchanges or our data providers.

排行榜以股友投资总额的回报率为依据。

限时排行榜 (比如过去30天)，仅计算在此时段开启或关闭的交易。

限区排行榜(如亚洲A股) 仅计算在特定证券交易所的交易。
请注意:\n我们保留去除非正常交易数据的权利(比如价格低于0.01美金或交易数量过大的) 。你可以下拉排行榜，查看持仓名单，浏览组成收益的具体交易
